results.title: Beneficial Effects of Metformin on the Central Nervous System, with a Focus on Epilepsy and Lafora Disease
results.text_hl: In this work, we will review the different proposed mechanisms of action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the beneficial effect that this drug has as a neuroprotective agent in different @<m>DISEASE_Heredodegenerative_Disorders_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020271 @@@neurological diseases@@@, with special attention to @DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@epileptic disorders@@@ and @DISEASE_Lafora_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D020192 @@@Lafora disease@@@, a form of progressive @DISEASE_Epilepsies_Myoclonic @DISEASE_MESH:D004831 @@@myoclonus epilepsy@@@ (see below).

results.title: Could metformin be therapeutically useful in Huntington's disease?
results.text_hl: In this regard, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may nonetheless be therapeutically useful for @<m>DISEASE_Heredodegenerative_Disorders_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020271 @@@neurological diseases@@@ with early pathological onsets, such as @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@HD@@@.

results.title: Mechanism of metformin regulation in central nervous system: Progression and future perspectives.
results.text_hl: These findings indicate there might be extensive pharmacological efficacy and therapeutic insights of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Heredodegenerative_Disorders_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020271 @@@neurological diseases@@@' clinical application.

results.title: Highlighting the Protective or Degenerative Role of AMPK Activators in Dementia Experimental Models.
results.text_hl: More specifically, we review the neuroprotective or neurodegenerative effects of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ or @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activators like @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_acadesine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C011651 @@@5-aminoimidazole-4-carboxamide- 1-beta-d-ribofuranoside@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Heredodegenerative_Disorders_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020271 @@@neurological diseases@@@ and @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@, which exert through the intracellular molecules involved in neuronal survival or death.

citations.NLM: Nikbakhtzadeh M, Shaerzadeh F, Ashabi G. Highlighting the Protective or Degenerative Role of AMPK Activators in Dementia Experimental Models. CNS Neurol Disord Drug Targets. 2021;20(9):786-801. PMID: 34042039
